name: Super Mario: Star Hunt
description: Logo by IronB(IronBoi) WARNING! This is NOT AN OFFICIAL GAME by Nintendo. It was created by "Super Mario" lover! I don't own some media files(Images, Music etc.) in this game. Credits to their owners! And also, this game isn't allowed to be paid or sold for any money. This is against the Nintendo rules (using Nintendo content for commercial-use). So please, don't sell this game to any person! Story Bowser kidnapped Princess Peach again and locked up in hers castle! To open it, Mario needs to have 150 stars. It's not an easy task! But Mario flies fast to space and tries to collect all stars. Game Instructions "In Space" Part: WASD or Arrow Keys - Move Character everywhere Platformer Part: WASD or Arrow Keys - Move Character left and right W or Up - Jump
